mapper.select: select distinct(DATE_FORMAT(msend_date, '%Y')) from message where mreceiver_id = #{mreceiverId} order by (DATE_FORMAT(msend_date, '%Y')) desc
select distinct(DATE_FORMAT(msend_date, '%Y')) from message where mowner_id = #{mownerId} order by (DATE_FORMAT(msend_date, '%Y')) desc

SELECT m.id as id, mowner_id, p.name as ownerName, mcontent, date_format(msend_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as msend_date, mreceiver_id FROM message m INNER join personal_info p WHERE m.mowner_id = p.empno and m.id = #{id}
